gist.headline: A new scribe in the garden
gist.blurb: Textify has joined the ecosystem. It's an AI-powered companion for crafting articles, posts, and marketing copy.
gist.summary: Added Textify, an AI content generation tool, to the community apps showcase.
gist.impact: Users can now discover and launch Textify directly from the Creative apps list.
gist.visual_concept: Textify represents writing and content creation. Visual symbols: Typewriters, quills, scrolls, floating letters. Scene: Polly the Bee acting as a writer/editor.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the bee mascot wearing a tiny writer's beret and glasses, sitting at a vintage desk with a cute pixel typewriter. Lime green (#ecf874) paper flows from the machine. Soft pastel gradient background. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Cozy pixel art, 8-bit aesthetic.
